sections.heading: Statements of coconspiratorsUpon written motion of the defendant, the court shall order the district attorney to disclose to the defendant the state's intent to use any written, recorded, or oral statements of coconspirators that the state intends to introduce in its case in chief pursuant to Code o
sections.text: Statements of coconspiratorsUpon written motion of the defendant, the court shall order the district attorney to disclose to the defendant the state's intent to use any written, recorded, or oral statements of coconspirators that the state intends to introduce in its case in chief pursuant to Code of Evidence Article 801(D)(3)(b).Added by Acts 1977, No. 515, ยง1. Acts 1988, No. 515, ยง3, eff. Jan. 1, 1989; Acts 2013, No. 250, ยง1.NOTE: See Acts 2013, No. 250, ยง2, relative to applicability.
